alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 7:02PM AKST until March 02 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Heaviest along the Upper Hillside. * WHERE...Anchorage Hillside. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light intermittent snow will intensify this evening and gradually taper off overnight. Northwest winds gusting to 25 mph may produce brief periods of blowing snow, which may reduce visibility. Driving on dry, fluffy snow may also resuspend snow and reduce visibility as well.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
